content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?

content: I had this conversation with a potential tenant named Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for the apartment in München.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: [Question] "Yes" or "No" is a binary choice, but the negotiation ended with a price of €1,388. So, I would say "Yes, we agreed on a final price."
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Yes, we agreed on a final price.
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.

content: [Answer] The final price, after negotiation, was agreed upon at €1,388 per month.
name: Peter Schmidt

content:

how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.

content: [Answer] I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Haoyu Wang, at 8.

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
